* **Trade Agreements**: This tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)

* **Region of Delivery**: National Capital Region (NCR)

**Status**
This tender has been cancelled by the government. No further action is required. 

**Disclaimer**

The information provided in this tender is subject to change and availability. The government reserves the right to modify or cancel this tender at any time without notice. It is the bidder's responsibility to verify the information and ensure compliance with all requirements.
